mlflex
Class SurvivalHelper

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.SurvivalHelper

public class SurvivalHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains utility methods to support survival analyses.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

SaveAnalysisFile

public java.lang.String SaveAnalysisFile(java.lang.String directory,
                                         java.lang.String description,
                                         boolean uniquifyFileName)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Saves a text file with survival values, which enables downstream applications to produce graphs and interpret the survival results.

Parameters:
directory - Absolute path of the directory where the file will be saved
description - Description used within file name
uniquifyFileName - Whether a unique identifier should be added to the file name
Returns:
Absolute path where the file was saved
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
